front.title: IANA Registration for an Enumservice Calling Name Delivery (CNAM) Information and IANA Registration for URI type 'pstndata'

abstract.t: This document registers the Enumservice 'pstndata' and subtype 'cnam' using the URI scheme 'pstndata:' as per the IANA registration process defined in the ENUM specification, RFC 3761 and registers a new URI type 'pstndata:'. This data is used to facilitate the transfer of Calling Name Delivery (CNAM) data for calls that originate on the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) that may be displayed on VoIP or other Real-time Client User Agents (CUA). The pstndata URI is created to facilitate this transfer, however this URI may be used to transport other PSTN data in the future.
